sources.title: The King Murder
sources.description: Title: The King Murder Summary: A beautiful blonde makes a career out of seducing and then blackmailing wealthy married men. She is found murdered after demanding a $5000 payoff from her latest victim, and the detective ... Directed by: Richard Thorpe Actors: Conway Tearle, Natalie Moorhead, Marceline Day Production Company: Chesterfield Motion Pictures Corporation (I) Release Date: 10 October 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A beautiful blonde makes a career out of seducing and then blackmailing wealthy married men. She is found murdered after demanding a $5000 payoff from her latest victim, and the detective investigating the case finds out that she was involved in a lot more than just blackmail.

sources.title: The King Murder (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Based on the unsolved 1923 murder of Broadway actress Dorothy King.
Stars: Natalie Moorhead, Conway Tearle, Marceline Day
Director: Richard Thorpe

A beautiful blonde makes a career out of seducing and then blackmailing wealthy married men. When she is found murdered, the investigating detective finds she was involved in a lot more than just blackmail!

sources.title: The King Murder 1932
